TopicTitle: How do I change the position of a node on a part?

Articles.Content:
Basically what I want to do is fix the upper node on the LM-01 cage decoupler (which I like for it's 0 ejection force) so that it's not so close to the lower one. They're so close that they overlap, which makes it really fiddly to put on.

If there's an easy way to do it, then cool, but if I have to use blender or something, then nvm.

I don't plan on publishing the part, though I did think about simply sharing it, no intent on grabbing any credit.
Just change the position vector in the config file. Probably stack\_node\_top = stuff. The first three coordinates are it's 3D position.
